sql.value: select distinct(kc.sys_customer_id) ,customer_name as customerName,member_card as memberCard,mobile,kcb.consume_total as consumeTotal,grd.grade_name as gradeName from kd_customer kc left join kd_customer_brand kcb on kc.sys_customer_id = kcb.sys_customer_id left join grade_rule_detail grd on kcb.member_grade = grd.grade where kc.state = 1 and kc.member_card != ''
SELECT grade AS v, grade_name AS k from grade_rule_detail WHERE state =1
